duck: Marginalization - Social exclusion is a concept used in many parts of the world to characterise contemporary forms of social disadvantage.
marginal definition: written or printed in the margin of a page or sheet.

wiki.text:
'Marginal' may refer to:
* For marginal constituency in politics, see “Marginal seat”
* For the manga, see Marginal (manga)
* For marginal model in hierarchical linear modeling, see “Marginal model”
* For marginal observables in physics, see “Renormalization group”
* For marginal person in sociology, see “Marginalization”
* For marginal plant see Bog Garden
* For Marginal crust band from Belgium, see “Marginal (Crust band)”
* For marginal probability in probability theory, see “Marginal distribution”
* For economic concepts, see “Marginalism”, and the various articles to which
  “Marginal concepts” is linked
